contact_heading.description: Main heading for the contact section
contact_heading.ai_prompt: Create a compelling heading for the contact section that encourages potential customers to request a quote.
examples: Get a Fast, Free Quote Now

contact_description.description: Description paragraph for the contact section
contact_description.ai_prompt: Write a brief paragraph describing what information customers should provide when contacting for a quote and what they can expect.
examples: Tell us about your {{ business.category }} needs (item type, specific requirements, location) and we will get back to you with a precise estimate within the hour.

expertise_heading.ai_prompt: Create a compelling heading for a section about specialized expertise for a {{ business.category }} service in {{ business.city }}.
examples: Expert Service: Our {{ business.primary_keyword }} Expertise in {{ business.city }}

expertise_description.description: Description paragraph for the expertise section
expertise_description.ai_prompt: Write a brief paragraph describing the specialized expertise of the {{ business.category }} service, emphasizing unique approaches and care for different customer needs.
examples: Every {{ business.primary_keyword }} project is unique. We are highly trained in handling all aspects of {{ business.category }} and applying specific techniques to ensure maximum quality and lasting results for our customers in {{ business.city }}.

expertise_1_title.description: Title for the first expertise card
expertise_1_title.ai_prompt: Create a short, impactful title for expertise in {{ business.category }} services.
examples: Expert {{ business.primary_keyword }}

expertise_1_description.description: Description for the first expertise card
expertise_1_description.ai_prompt: Write a brief description highlighting the expertise in {{ business.category }} services for {{ business.primary_keyword }}.
examples: Professional {{ business.primary_keyword }} services with attention to detail and quality results. Using industry-leading techniques for optimal outcomes.

expertise_2_title.description: Title for the second expertise card
expertise_2_title.ai_prompt: Create a short, impactful title for expertise in {{ business.category }} protection and maintenance.
examples: Quality Protection

expertise_2_description.description: Description for the second expertise card
expertise_2_description.ai_prompt: Write a brief description highlighting the expertise in providing long-lasting {{ business.category }} solutions.
examples: Apply professional {{ business.category }} techniques to ensure lasting results, keeping your {{ business.primary_keyword }} in excellent condition for longer.

expertise_3_title.description: Title for the third expertise card
expertise_3_title.ai_prompt: Create a short, impactful title for expertise in health and safety aspects of {{ business.category }} services.
examples: Health & Safety

expertise_3_description.description: Description for the third expertise card
expertise_3_description.ai_prompt: Write a brief description highlighting the health and safety benefits of professional {{ business.category }} services.
examples: Our {{ business.primary_keyword }} services prioritize health and safety, using industry-approved methods that create a better, healthier environment for your home or business.

expertise_4_title.description: Title for the fourth expertise card
expertise_4_title.ai_prompt: Create a short, impactful title for expertise in emergency {{ business.category }} services.
examples: Emergency Services

expertise_4_description.description: Description for the fourth expertise card
expertise_4_description.ai_prompt: Write a brief description highlighting the expertise in emergency {{ business.category }} services.
examples: Fast response for urgent {{ business.primary_keyword }} needs. Our team quickly addresses emergency situations with professional solutions in {{ business.city }}.

expertise_cta_heading.description: Heading for the call-to-action at the bottom of the expertise section
expertise_cta_heading.ai_prompt: Create a compelling heading for a call-to-action about specialized {{ business.category }} needs.
examples: Need Specialized Care for Your {{ business.primary_keyword }}?

expertise_cta_button.description: Text for the call-to-action button in the expertise section
expertise_cta_button.ai_prompt: Create a short, action-oriented text for a button about discussing custom {{ business.category }} needs.
examples: Discuss Your Custom Needs

page_title.description: Dynamic page title that incorporates business category, city and state from business data
page_title.ai_prompt: Create a compelling page title for a local {{ business.category }} service that includes the business type and location. Make it SEO-friendly and include the primary keyword '{{ business.primary_keyword }}' along with city and state variables.
examples: Expert {{ business.category }} Services | Local {{ business.primary_keyword }} in {{ business.city }}, {{ business.state }}

meta_description.ai_prompt: Write a meta description for a {{ business.category }} business website that includes the primary keyword and location.
examples: Optimized for Local {{ business.primary_keyword }} Services in {{ business.city }}.

meta_keywords.description: SEO meta keywords for the page
meta_keywords.ai_prompt: Generate relevant SEO keywords for a local {{ business.category }} business, including the primary keyword '{{ business.primary_keyword }}', additional services {{ business.additional_services }}, location names, and related terms. Separate with commas.
examples: {{ business.primary_keyword }}, {{ business.category }} services, {{ business.additional_services[0] }}, {{ business.additional_services[1] }}, local {{ business.primary_keyword }}, {{ business.city }} {{ business.category }}, {{ business.state }} {{ business.primary_keyword }}

geo_position.description: Geographic coordinates (latitude;longitude) - AI should generate based on the business city and state
geo_position.ai_prompt: Generate the latitude and longitude coordinates for {{ business.city }}, {{ business.state }} in the format: latitude;longitude (e.g., 30.2672;-97.7431). Use accurate coordinates for the city center.

hero_heading.description: Main heading for the hero section
hero_heading.ai_prompt: Create a compelling headline for a local {{ business.category }} service that emphasizes being the top choice in {{ business.city }} ONLY. Include the primary keyword '{{ business.primary_keyword }}' and highlight local presence in {{ business.city }}. Do NOT include any service areas or other cities.
examples: The #1 {{ business.primary_keyword }} Service in {{ business.city }}

hero_subheading.description: Supporting text below the main heading
hero_subheading.ai_prompt: Write a brief, compelling subheading that highlights the key benefits of the {{ business.category }} service. Focus on quality, reliability, and results.
examples: Professional {{ business.category }} Services with Fast Response Times. Reliable Solutions for All Your {{ business.primary_keyword }} Needs.

hero_cta.ai_prompt: Create a short, action-oriented call-to-action for booking a {{ business.category }} service.
examples: Book Your Service Today!

why_us_heading.description: Heading for the Why Us section
why_us_heading.ai_prompt: Create a heading that emphasizes local trust and expertise for a {{ business.category }} service.
examples: Why Local Residents Trust Our {{ business.primary_keyword }} Experts

benefit_1_title.ai_prompt: Create a short, impactful title for the eco-friendly aspect of the {{ business.category }} service.
examples: Eco-Safe Solutions

benefit_1_description.ai_prompt: Write a brief description highlighting the eco-friendly and safe nature of the {{ business.category }} solutions.
examples: Safe for children, pets, and the planet. No harsh chemicals.

benefit_2_title.ai_prompt: Create a short, impactful title emphasizing the local and quick service.
examples: Fast, Local Service

benefit_2_description.ai_prompt: Write a brief description highlighting the quick response time and local knowledge of the service.
examples: Same-day appointments often available. We know the area.

benefit_3_title.ai_prompt: Create a short, impactful title emphasizing the professional qualifications of the staff.
examples: Certified Technicians

benefit_3_description.ai_prompt: Write a brief description highlighting the training and certification of the {{ business.category }} technicians.
examples: Fully trained and certified professionals for optimal results.

benefit_4_title.ai_prompt: Create a short, impactful title emphasizing the satisfaction guarantee.
examples: 100% Satisfaction

benefit_4_description.ai_prompt: Write a brief description highlighting the satisfaction guarantee and re-service policy.
examples: If you're not happy, we re-service for free. Guaranteed.

why_us_cta.description: Call to action button text for the Why Us section
why_us_cta.ai_prompt: Create a compelling call-to-action for scheduling a {{ business.category }} service that emphasizes ease and convenience.
examples: Schedule Your Hassle-Free Service

process_heading.description: Heading for the service process section
process_heading.ai_prompt: Create a heading that describes a simple, step-by-step {{ business.category }} service process.
examples: Our Simple 3-Step {{ business.category }} Process

step_1_title.description: Title for the first step in the service process
step_1_title.ai_prompt: Create a short, descriptive title for the booking and preparation step of the {{ business.category }} process.
examples: Book & Prep

step_1_description.description: Description for the first step in the service process
step_1_description.ai_prompt: Write a brief description of the booking and preparation process for {{ business.category }} services, including scheduling and initial assessment.
examples: Schedule your {{ business.primary_keyword }} service online or by phone. We'll discuss your specific needs and provide a transparent quote before your appointment.

step_2_title.description: Title for the second step in the service process
step_2_title.ai_prompt: Create a short, descriptive title for the main service step of the {{ business.category }} process.
examples: Service Delivery

step_2_description.description: Description for the second step in the service process
step_2_description.ai_prompt: Write a brief description of the main service delivery process for {{ business.category }}, highlighting thoroughness and quality.
examples: Our trained professionals use industry-leading techniques and equipment to deliver exceptional {{ business.primary_keyword }} results that meet your specific needs.

step_3_title.description: Title for the third step in the service process
step_3_title.ai_prompt: Create a short, descriptive title for the final inspection and completion step of the {{ business.category }} process.
examples: Inspect & Complete

step_3_description.description: Description for the third step in the service process
step_3_description.ai_prompt: Write a brief description of the final inspection and completion process for {{ business.category }} services, emphasizing customer involvement and quality assurance.
examples: Final inspection with you, followed by quality assurance steps to ensure you're completely satisfied with our {{ business.primary_keyword }} service.

communities_heading.description: Heading for the local communities section
communities_heading.ai_prompt: Create a heading that emphasizes the business serves specific local communities.
examples: We Proudly Serve the Following Local Communities

communities_description.description: Description for the local communities section
communities_description.ai_prompt: Write a brief description encouraging potential customers from local neighborhoods to call for the {{ business.category }} service.
examples: If you need professional {{ business.primary_keyword }} services in any of these neighborhoods, call us today!

communities_contact_cta.description: Call to action text for contacting about service areas not listed
communities_contact_cta.ai_prompt: Create a brief call-to-action encouraging visitors to contact the business if their area isn't listed.
examples: Don't see your area? Contact us to confirm availability →

testimonials_heading.ai_prompt: Write a heading for the testimonials section that emphasizes local customer satisfaction with the {{ business.category }} service.
examples: What Our Local {{ business.primary_keyword }} Customers Say

testimonial_1_text.ai_prompt: Write a testimonial from a satisfied customer about the quality of {{ business.category }} service, focusing on results and professionalism.
examples: The {{ business.primary_keyword }} service was exceptional! The results exceeded my expectations. Fast service and very professional team from {{ business.city }}.

testimonial_1_author.description: Name and location of the first testimonial author
testimonial_1_author.ai_prompt: Create a name and location for the first testimonial author.
examples: Sarah L., Willow Creek

testimonial_2_text.ai_prompt: Write a testimonial from a satisfied customer about the timeliness and efficiency of the {{ business.category }} service.
examples: Best {{ business.primary_keyword }} experience ever. They were on time and extremely efficient. Highly recommend!

testimonial_2_author.description: Name and location of the second testimonial author
testimonial_2_author.ai_prompt: Create a name and location for the second testimonial author.
examples: Michael B., Downtown Heights

testimonial_3_text.ai_prompt: Write a testimonial from a satisfied customer about the eco-friendly products used in the {{ business.category }} service.
examples: I appreciate their commitment to eco-friendly products. My kids are sensitive, and it was great knowing the {{ business.primary_keyword }} was safe for our home in {{ business.city }}.

testimonial_3_author.description: Name and location of the third testimonial author
testimonial_3_author.ai_prompt: Create a name and location for the third testimonial author.
examples: Jessica H., Eastside Borough

faq_heading.ai_prompt: Write a heading for the frequently asked questions section about {{ business.category }} services.
examples: Frequently Asked Questions About {{ business.primary_keyword }} Services

faqs.description: Array of FAQ items with questions and answers

question.ai_prompt: Write a seo optimzed question about {{ business.category }} services.

answer.ai_prompt: Write a detailed answer to the question about {{ business.category }} services.

examples.question: How long does a typical {{ business.primary_keyword }} service take to complete?
examples.answer: A standard {{ business.primary_keyword }} service usually takes 1-2 hours. Our professional team works efficiently to complete your service with minimal disruption to your schedule in {{ business.city }}.

examples.question: Are your {{ business.category }} methods safe for my family and pets?
examples.answer: Absolutely. We exclusively use non-toxic, biodegradable, and pH-neutral solutions that are entirely safe for children, pets, and individuals with allergies in {{ business.city }}.

examples.question: Do you offer specific treatment for stubborn issues in {{ business.primary_keyword }}?
examples.answer: Yes, we specialize in advanced treatments for tough issues in {{ business.primary_keyword }}. Our technicians are trained to handle all common challenges in {{ business.city }}.

guarantee_heading.description: Heading for the satisfaction guarantee section
guarantee_heading.ai_prompt: Write a heading for the satisfaction guarantee section that emphasizes the 100% satisfaction promise for {{ business.category }} services.
examples: Our {{ business.primary_keyword }} Satisfaction Guarantee

guarantee_description.ai_prompt: Write a description of the satisfaction guarantee, mentioning that unsatisfied customers will receive a free re-service for {{ business.primary_keyword }} services.
examples: We stand by our work. If you are not completely delighted with your {{ business.primary_keyword }} results, we will return and re-service the area for free.

guarantee_tagline.description: Short tagline for the guarantee section
guarantee_tagline.ai_prompt: Write a short tagline for the guarantee section that emphasizes zero risk and quality service.
examples: That's the promise. Zero risk, maximum satisfaction.

services_section_title.description: Main title for the services section
services_section_title.ai_prompt: Create an engaging section title that highlights the core services offered by the {{ business.category }} business. Make it local and service-focused.
examples: Our Core Local {{ business.primary_keyword }} Services

service_1_title.description: Title for the first core service
service_1_title.ai_prompt: Create a compelling title for the primary {{ business.category }} service. Make it descriptive and benefit-focused.
examples: Primary {{ business.primary_keyword }} Service

service_1_description.description: Description for the first core service
service_1_description.ai_prompt: Write a detailed description of the primary {{ business.category }} service, highlighting the process, benefits, and results. Focus on what makes it effective.
examples: Specialized methods to deliver exceptional results for all {{ business.primary_keyword }} needs, ensuring complete satisfaction and outstanding quality.

service_2_title.description: Title for the second core service
service_2_title.ai_prompt: Create a title for the secondary {{ business.category }} service that emphasizes precision and care.
examples: Precision {{ business.primary_keyword }} Care

service_2_description.description: Description for the second core service
service_2_description.ai_prompt: Describe the secondary {{ business.category }} service, emphasizing versatility, attention to detail, and quality methods.
examples: From basic to complex {{ business.primary_keyword }} needs, we handle all services with attention to detail and industry-leading solutions.

service_3_title.description: Title for the third core service
service_3_title.ai_prompt: Create a title for the specialized {{ business.category }} service that emphasizes effectiveness and specialization.
examples: Specialized {{ business.primary_keyword }} Solutions

service_3_description.description: Description for the third core service
service_3_description.ai_prompt: Describe the specialized {{ business.category }} service, emphasizing guaranteed results, professional methods, and effectiveness.
examples: Guaranteed complete resolution of challenging {{ business.primary_keyword }} issues using professional, specialized treatments designed for tough situations.

closing_cta_heading.description: Heading for the final call-to-action section
closing_cta_heading.ai_prompt: Create a compelling heading for the final call-to-action that encourages visitors to book {{ business.category }} services.
examples: Ready for Professional {{ business.primary_keyword }}?

closing_cta_text.description: Text for the final call-to-action section
closing_cta_text.ai_prompt: Write a brief, compelling text for the final call-to-action that creates urgency.
examples: Don't wait! The best local {{ business.primary_keyword }} service is just a click or call away.

closing_cta_button.description: Text for the final call-to-action button
closing_cta_button.ai_prompt: Create a short, action-oriented text for the final call-to-action button.
examples: Get Your Quote Now →

footer_company_description.description: Short description of the company in the footer
footer_company_description.ai_prompt: Write a brief description of the company for the footer section.
examples: Local experts in professional {{ business.primary_keyword }}. Dedicated to your home's comfort and quality.

footer_service_details.description: Brief description of services in the footer
footer_service_details.ai_prompt: Write a brief description of the services offered for the footer section.
examples: Specializing in {{ business.primary_keyword }} and related services. Serving all {{ business.city }} locations.

footer_copyright.ai_prompt: Create a short copyright text for the footer.
examples: Optimized for Local {{ business.primary_keyword }} Services.
